titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the United Association of Journeymen and Apprentices of the Plumbing and Pipe Fitting Industry, Local 638 Photographs PHOTOS.084
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Rachel Searcy

publicationstmt.publisher: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2014-09-11T16:53-0400

did.unittitle: United Association of Journeymen and Apprentices of the Plumbing and Pipe Fitting Industry, Local 638 Photographs

repository.corpname: Tamiment Library and Robert F. Wagner Labor Archive

physdesc.extent: in 2 folders in a shared manuscript box

did.abstract: Steamfitters' Local 638 is a subsidiary of the United Association of Journeymen and Apprentices of the Plumbing and Pipe Fitting Industry of the United States and Canada that is headquartered in Long Island City, New York. This collection consists of photographic negatives and prints of classes and staff members at the Steamfitters' Local 638 Industry Training Center in Long Island City. Photographs were taken by Werner Ulrich, the center's Director of Education.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: United Association of Journeymen and Apprentices of the Plumbing and Pipe Fitting Industry. Local 638.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection has not been arranged by an archivist. The materials are arranged in the order in which they were received from the donor.

bioghist.head: Historical/Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Steamfitters' Local 638 is a subsidiary of the United Association of Journeymen and Apprentices of the Plumbing and Pipe Fitting Industry of the United States and Canada that is headquartered in Long Island City, New York.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Copyright (and related rights to publicity and privacy) to materials in this collection created by the Steamfitters' Local 638 are held by the Steamfitters' Local 638. Permission to publish or reproduce materials to which s/he holds copyright must be secured from the copyright holder. Please contact the Tamiment Library for assistance with contacting the Steamfitters' Local 638.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Donated by Janet Greene in 1998. The accession number associated with this gift is NPA.1998.021 and NPA.2007.035.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of photographic negatives and prints of classes and staff members at the Steamfitters' Local 638 Industry Training Center in Long Island City. Photographs were taken by Werner Ulrich, the center's Director of Education.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
